q: Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
h:
“Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.” —
William Faulkner

q: The majority of what you want will come from the minority of what you do.
h:
“The majority of what you want will come from the minority of what you do.” —
Gary Keller

q: Remember the entrance to the sanctuary is inside you.
h:
“Remember the entrance to the sanctuary is inside you.” —
Rumi

q: Meditate. It won't be fun but it will surface what you need to deal with.
h:
“Meditate. It won't be fun but it will surface what you need to deal with.” —
Naval Ravikant

q: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.
h:
“In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.” —
Thomas Jefferson

q: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
h:
“Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.” —
Abraham Lincoln

q: It's your life; you don't need someone's permission to live the life you want. Be brave to live from your heart.
h:
“It's your life; you don't need someone's permission to live the life you want. Be brave to live from your heart.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Perfectionism is simply putting a limit on your future.
h:
“Perfectionism is simply putting a limit on your future.” —
John Eliot

q: Everyone sees what you appear to be, few experience what you really are.
h:
“Everyone sees what you appear to be, few experience what you really are.” —
Niccolo Machiavelli

q: Life is a question and how we live it is our answer.
h:
“Life is a question and how we live it is our answer.” —
Gary Keller

q: You are what you do, not what you say you'll do.
h:
“You are what you do, not what you say you'll do.” —
Carl Jung

q: The truth is simple. If it was complicated, everyone would understand it.
h:
“The truth is simple. If it was complicated, everyone would understand it.” —
Walt Whitman

q: Man invented language to satisfy his deep need to complain.
h:
“Man invented language to satisfy his deep need to complain.” —
Lily Tomlin

q: When asked, how do you write? I invariably answer, one word at a time.
h:
“When asked, how do you write? I invariably answer, one word at a time.” —
Stephen King

q: When the mind is calm, how quickly, how smoothly, how beautifully you will perceive everything.
h:
“When the mind is calm, how quickly, how smoothly, how beautifully you will perceive everything.” —
Paramahansa Yogananda

q: A hero is an ordinary person doing things in an extra ordinary way.
h:
“A hero is an ordinary person doing things in an extra ordinary way.” —
Christopher Reeve

q: People who belittle people, will be LITTLE people, and will accomplish very Little
h:
“People who belittle people, will be LITTLE people, and will accomplish very Little” —
Norman Vincent Peale

q: Arise, slay thy enemies, enjoy a prosperous kingdom.
h:
“Arise, slay thy enemies, enjoy a prosperous kingdom.” —
Bhagavad Gita

q: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
h:
“A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.” —
Jonathan Swift

q: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
h:
“Quiet people have the loudest minds.” —
Stephen King

q: What do we live for if not to make life less difficult for each other?
h:
“What do we live for if not to make life less difficult for each other?” —
T.S. Eliot

q: Still your waters.
h:
“Still your waters.” —
Josh Waitzkin

q: When angry count to ten before you speak. If very angry, count to one hundred.
h:
“When angry count to ten before you speak. If very angry, count to one hundred.” —
Thomas Jefferson

q: Everyone can rise above their circumstances and achieve success if they are dedicated to and passionate about what they do.
h:
“Everyone can rise above their circumstances and achieve success if they are dedicated to and passionate about what they do.” —
Nelson Mandela

q: The thing about smart people is that they seem like crazy people to dumb people.
h:
“The thing about smart people is that they seem like crazy people to dumb people.” —
Stephen Hawking

q: Life should be touched, not strangled.
h:
“Life should be touched, not strangled. ” —
Ray Bradbury

q: Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
h:
“Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.” —
Conrad Hilton

q: The only way it gets better for you is when you get better. Better is not something you wish, it's something you become.
h:
“The only way it gets better for you is when you get better. Better is not something you wish, it's something you become.” —
Jim Rohn

q: A flower falls, even though we love it; and a weed grows, even though we do not love it.
h:
“A flower falls, even though we love it; and a weed grows, even though we do not love it.” —
Dogen

q: The world is open for play, everything and everybody is mockable in a wonderful way.
h:
“The world is open for play, everything and everybody is mockable in a wonderful way.” —
Robin Williams

q: I am thankful to all those who said no. It's because of them, I did it myself.
h:
“I am thankful to all those who said no. It's because of them, I did it myself. ” —
Wayne Dyer

q: Your setback is just a setup for a comeback.
h:
“Your setback is just a setup for a comeback.” —
Steve Harvey

q: At first dreams seem impossible, then improbable, then inevitable.
h:
“At first dreams seem impossible, then improbable, then inevitable.” —
Christopher Reeve
